original_title: School cricket coach arrested with weapons belonging to ‘Ganemulla Sanjeewa’
original_body_lines: A cricket coach of a leading school in Wattala has reportedly been arrested after a cache of weapons allegedly belonging to notorious underworld figure Sanjeewa Kumara alias ‘Ganemulla Sanjeewa’ was found in his possession.
Accordingly, police had recovered a T-56 assault rifle, 04 magazines and 18 rounds of 9mm ammunition from the sports room of the cricket coach in question.
